sense.gloss: depressed, dispirited, down in the dumps, dark (mood)
to get dark, to grow dark
to end (of a day, year, season, etc.), to come to an end, to close
to be sunk in (e.g. despair), to be lost in (e.g. thought), to be overcome with
fast asleep, dead to the world
to get dark after sunset, to turn to dusk, to fade into twilight
to decline (after a peak), to wane, to lose vigour
to be lost in thought, to be in a pensive mood, to look melancholic
to get dark after sunset, to turn to dusk, to fade into twilight
to decline (after a peak), to wane, to lose vigour

sdata.j: われわれの↑文明↑↓ぶんめい↓の↑黄昏↑↓たそがれ↓に。
sdata.e: We find ourselves in the twilight of our civilization.

sdata.j: ↑隣人↑↓りんじん↓は↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓ながら↑交通↑↓こうつう↓↑事故↑↓じこ↓に↑遭↑↓あ↓って、↑昏睡↑↓こんすい↓↑状態↑↓じょうたい↓になってしまった。
sdata.e: Unfortunately, my neighbor had a traffic accident and fell into a coma.

sdata.j: ↑患者↑↓かんじゃ↓は↑深↑↓ふか↓い↑昏睡↑↓こんすい↓↑状態↑↓じょうたい↓にあります。
sdata.e: The patient is in a state of profound stupor.

sdata.j: それからあなたは↑二↑↓に↓↑ヶ月↑↓かげつ↓↑昏睡↑↓こんすい↓↑状態↑↓じょうたい↓でした。
sdata.e: After that, you were in a state of stupor for two months.

sdata.j: ↑患者↑↓かんじゃ↓は↑深↑↓ふか↓い↑昏睡↑↓こんすい↓↑状態↑↓じょうたい↓にあります。
sdata.e: The patient is in a deep coma.

sdata.j: ブラウン↑氏↑↓し↓は↑人生↑↓じんせい↓の↑黄昏↑↓たそがれ↓↑時↑↓どき↓を↑迎↑↓むか↓えた。
sdata.e: Mr Brown is in the sunset of his life.

sdata.j: トムは↑昏睡↑↓こんすい↓↑状態↑↓じょうたい↓なんですか？
↑黄昏↑↓たそがれ↓↑時↑↓どき↓が↑大好↑↓だいす↓きでね。
ドイツの↑黄昏時↑↓たそがれどき↓は↑日本↑↓にほん↓の↑深夜↑↓しんや↓です。
sdata.e: When it's dusk in Germany, it's late at night in Japan.
